name: Name
password-reminder-popup: Please contact IT support by phone:
join-seeking: Seeking an IT-related education or trying to discover yourself in the field.
join-future: In the future you wish to be a multi-functional IT specialist, who is capable of more than coding.
join-enjoy: Have a burning desire to improve, show initiative and already have basic skills - you enjoy coding, creating web applications or helping your friends solve technical problems.
join-shift: Able to devote time for theoretical and practical assignments. The internship will take place every workday 2 PM - 6 PM.
why-competence: You will take part in developing projects, raise your competence and learn the principles of Agile methodology.
why-bank: You will see a bank without a tie where we work and celebrate together.
questions: If you have any questions - message us at atranka@Įmonės_pavadinimas.lt
